participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities but can be somewhat clumsy.
participant_1.background: My paddle board is calling my name. I am clumsy, I often trip over my own feet and bump into things. I have often been called a slacker. My brother and I have bright red hair. I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and curious, finds joy in simple things and enjoys learning about her heritage.
participant_2.background: I'm married to a government worker and love milk with my large meals. I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast. I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend. I read everything I could about my family history. My parents are lawyers.

content.text: Hey there! I am looking for someone to go paddle boarding with me.
That sounds really fun! I have never been paddle boarding before.
It is great exercise and a lot of fun.
I would love to try it with you.
What day would work best for you?
I am free on Tuesday or Wednesday.
I know a great spot on the lake.
What time would work best for you?
I can meet you at 10:00 am.
Great! I can't wait to go paddle boarding with you.
Me too! I will see you on Tuesday.
